channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- WhatsApp Business for iOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- WhatsApp Business for iOS

item.title: CVE-2021-24026|2024-08-03T19:21:17.055Z -- facebook -- whatsapp%20business%20for%20ios
item.description: A missing bounds check within the audio decoding pipeline for WhatsApp calls in WhatsApp for Android prior to v2.21.3, WhatsApp Business for Android prior to v2.21.3, WhatsApp for iOS prior to v2.21.32, and WhatsApp Business for iOS prior to v2.21.32 could have allowed an out-of-bounds write.
